name: _id
description: The block hash.

name: accumulatedFees
description: The accumulated fees that were payed in the block.

name: developerFees
description: The developer fees that were accumulated in the block.

name: epoch
description: The epoch when the block was proposed and executed.

name: epochStartBlock
description: Whether the current block is an epoch-start block.

name: epochStartInfo

fields.name: nodePrice
fields.description: EGLD amount required to run a validator.

fields.name: prevEpochStartHash
fields.description: The hash of the previous epoch start block.

fields.name: prevEpochStartRound
fields.description: The round of the previous epoch start block.

fields.name: rewardsForProtocolSustainability
fields.description: The amount of rewards for the protocol sustainability address.

fields.name: rewardsPerBlock
fields.description: The amount of EGLD rewards per block.

fields.name: totalNewlyMinted
fields.description: The amount of the newly minted EGLD.

fields.name: totalSupply
fields.description: The EGLD supply.

fields.name: totalToDistribute
fields.description: The amount of EGLD that will be distributed to validators/delegators.

description: A structure with information about the new epoch.

name: epochStartShardsData

fields.name: epoch
fields.description: The epoch number.

fields.name: firstPendingMetaBlock
fields.description: The first pending metablock hash.

fields.name: headerHash
fields.description: The hash of the epoch start block.

fields.name: lastFinishedMetaBlock
fields.description: The last finished metablock hash.

fields.name: nonce
fields.description: The sequence number (block height) of the epoch start block.

fields.name: pendingMiniBlockHeaders
hash
fields.description: The miniblock hash.

fields.name: receiverShard
fields.description: The receiver shard.

fields.name: senderShard
fields.description: The sender shard.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The timestamp of the miniblock.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the miniblock.
An array of structures with information about the pending miniblocks.

fields.name: rootHash
fields.description: The root hash of the epoch start block.

fields.name: round
fields.description: The first round of the epoch.

fields.name: scheduledRootHash
fields.description: The 'scheduled' root hash of the epoch start block.

fields.name: shardID
fields.description: The shard ID.

description: An array of structures with information about the epoch start.

name: gasPenalized
description: The total gas that was penalized in the block.

name: gasProvided
description: The total gas that was provided in the block.

name: gasRefunded
description: The total gas that was refunded in the block.

name: maxGasLimit
description: The total gas that can be provided in the block.

name: miniBlocksDetails

fields.name: firstProcessedTx
fields.description: The index of the first transaction that was processed in the miniblock.

fields.name: lastProcessedTx
fields.description: The index of the last transaction that was processed in the miniblock.

fields.name: senderShard
fields.description: The sender shard.

fields.name: receiverShard
fields.description: The receiver shard.

fields.name: mbIndex
fields.description: The index of the miniblock.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the miniblock.

fields.name: procType
fields.description: The processing type of the miniblock.

fields.name: txsHashes
fields.description: The hashes of the transactions that were included in the miniblock.

description: An array of structures with information about the miniblocks within the block.

name: miniBlocksHashes
description: An array of the miniblock hashes (hexadecimal encoded) that were included in the block.

name: nonce
description: The sequence number of the block (block height).

name: notarizedBlocksHashes
description: The hashes of the blocks that were notarized in the current block.

name: notarizedTxsCount
description: The number of transactions that were notarized in the block.

name: prevHash
description: The hash of the previous block.

name: proposer
description: The index of the validator that proposed the block.

name: pubKeyBitmap
description: The pub key bitmap.

name: round
description: The round when the block was proposed and executed.

name: scheduledData
description: A structure that contains data about the scheduled execution.

name: shardId
description: The shard this block belongs to.

name: size
description: The size of the block in bytes.

name: sizeTxs
description: The size of the block's transactions in bytes.

name: stateRootHash
description: The trie's state root hash when the block was proposed and executed.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the block was proposed and executed.

name: txCount
description: The number of transactions that were executed in the block.

name: validators
description: An array that contains the indices of the validators that signed the block.
